column4: has anyone got any ideas why my ubuntu would stick on "starting up"?
it worked fine off the livecd, and I installed it on the hard drive and then it just didn't work :(
... you can try to remove the silent keyword into boot 'rules'
how would I go about doing that?
have you tried what I said?
you have to delete the quiet keyword
is in that parameters you can edit
after the kernel, that long long name, you have to scroll  the line maybe
ok you have to delete the quiet and splash
delete that words... so the system will boot with extra debug informations for you, and for us!!
Do you have a custom kernel?
